channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2026 College Football Transfer Portal Tracker: Indiana QB Alberto Mendoza Enters
item.description: The college football transfer portal opened on Jan. 2, but players didn't wait until then to announce their intentions to enter it.

item.title: What's Next: How Should Texans Approach C.J. Stroud’s Future After Playoff Flameout?
item.description: Texans QB C.J. Stroud becomes extension-eligible this offseason. Here's how Houston should approach his contract situation.

item.title: Favorite 'Dogs: Why Broncos, Rams Can Win Conference Title Matchups
item.description: Will Hill makes his case for why this weekend's underdogs — the Broncos and Rams — are capable of advancing to the Super Bowl.

item.title: Who is Charlie Becker? What to Know About Emerging Indiana Hoosiers Receiver
item.description: Charlie Becker starred in Indiana's College Football Playoff championship win over Miami. Here's what to know about the receiver.

item.title: Indiana HC Curt Cignetti on QB Fernando Mendoza: 'He Has the Heart of a Lion'
item.description: Following Indiana's National Championship triumph, Hoosiers coach Curt Cignetti raved about his quarterback, Fernando Mendoza.

item.title: CFP takeaways: Even as a favored Goliath, Indiana's win stands alone in sports history
item.description: Put it next to the Miracle on Ice and NC State-Georgetown. In a wild title game, here's how Indiana beat Miami.

item.title: 8-8 in the playoffs with Josh Allen? Buffalo fired Sean McDermott, but there's more blame to go around
item.description: With postseason losses piling up, the Bills fired coach Sean McDermott. But will it change anything? And where did things go wrong?

item.title: 'Obviously, we would have a great team': What Russian NHLers are saying about missing the Olympics
item.description: Russia is suspended from international competition due to the war in Ukraine, sidelining many who'd otherwise be playing.

item.title: Which injuries will have the biggest impact on the Olympic hockey tournament?
item.description: Leo Carlsson, Brayden Point and Seth Jones are among those ailing ahead of Milan Cortina.

item.title: Indiana fans erase forgettable history with unforgettable title
item.description: Indiana had the most losses, a long Big Ten title drought, no Heismans and no national titles. No more.
